name: Till Death Do Us Part (finallevelgamer)
description:
Help a couple traverse a series of platforms together as they try to reach safety before the end of the world. 

Controls

Use the left mouse button to control the left hand and the right mouse button to control the right hand. Use W,A,S,D to move left and right. 

*Important: You'll be controlling the arms and movement of both characters simultaneously.

You will also need to bring the wife with you in order through the whole level in order to win the game.

Be warned, this game is very clunky and there is no audio as it is a working prototype and made within the time constraints of a game jam.

Enjoy
